mapper.select: select p.`no`, p.name, p.price, p.coname, p.content, p.`status`, p.category_no as categoryNo, i.new_name as newName from product p, image i where category_no = #{no} and p.`no` = i.product_no group by i.product_no having p.`no` = i.product_no
select p.no, p.name, p.price, p.coname, p.content, p.status, c.name as categoryName from product p, category c where c.`no` = p.category_no order by p.no desc
select p.no, p.name, p.price, p.coname, p.content, p.status, i.new_name as newName from product p, image i where i.product_no = p.no order by p.no desc
